title: Home
author: GSadmin
description: The College of Naturopathic Physicians of British Columbia is committed to providing standards of professional practice amongst naturopathic physicians of BC.
cleaned_text: Welcome to the official website of the COLLEGE OF NATUROPATHIC PHYSICIANS OF BC The College of Naturopathic Physicians of British Columbia (CNPBC) is the regulatory body responsible for licensing and regulating naturopathic doctors in BC under the Health Professions Act. The College protects the public interest by ensuring that naturopathic physicians in British Columbia practice safely, ethically, and competently. ——————————————————————————————————————- CNPBC Updates: CNPBC's office will be closed on Monday, Sep 4th, 2023 for Labour Day. Our virtual office will reopen for business at 8:30 a.m. on Tuesday, Sep 5th, 2023 Updates from the Public Health Officer: - The Provincial Health Officer(PHO) is now posted here [: Mask Use and Infection Prevention & Control Guidance for Health Professionals - April 1, 2022](https://www2.gov.bc.ca/assets/gov/health/about-bc-s-health-care-system/office-of-the-provincial-health-officer/covid-19/mask_use_and_infection_prevention_and_control_guidance_for_health_professionals.pdf)(pdf). Registrants should review the PHO letter for details and refer to resources from sources such as the BC Centre for Disease Control and WorkSafeBC to determine how to apply these recommendations to their own practice setting. [2022-03-08, NEW PHO REQUIRES CNPBC TO RECORD VACCINATION STATUS OF REGISTRANTS](https://cnpbc.bc.ca/wp-content/uploads/New-PHO-Requires-CNPBC-to-Record-Vaccination-Status-of-Registrants.pdf) - Provincial Health Officer Dr. Bonnie Henry has announced she will issue a new public health order requiring all regulated health professionals to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19. [This expands upon an order issued in October 2021](https://www.bccnm.ca/bccnm/Announcements/Pages/Announcement.aspx?AnnouncementID=301)and will go into effect on March 24, 2022. - For more information, read the [Ministry of Health information bulletin about the new PHO order](https://news.gov.bc.ca/releases/2022HLTH0047-000195).
